entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the one who presented a battle helmet to Karkus and had conversations with him.

entities.name: karkus
entities.description: Karkus is a giant who was presented with a battle helmet by Hagrid and showed interest in Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person mentioned as having argued against the killing of giants.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Hagrid's companions who asked about what happened to Karkus.

relationships.description: Hagrid presented a battle helmet to Karkus.
